summary:
Lots of changes to perks in almost all trees. 
More diversity in skills 
I remained close to vanilla values so nothing should be too overpowered or underpowered.
descriptionHtml:
Lots of changes to perks in almost all trees. 
More diversity in skills 
I remained close to vanilla values so nothing should be overpowered or underpowered. 

Investor perk works but doesn\'t show proper description. 
Please inform me of any bugs you might find. 

Update v1.1.0
Corrected some skill levels
Added Readme.txt
Text message from investor perk still bugged. Perk works tho

********** 
Best way to use this mod is with a new character 
Or you have to reset all perks on an existing character. 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30684] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30684 [/url]

Make sure to have a backup of your save games!!
author: Swilden
